statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT response_1 FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'question';
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, performance_score FROM user_interactions WHERE response_1 LIKE '%positive%' AND response_2 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, response_1, response_2, performance_score FROM user_interactions WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC

SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, response_1, response_2, performance_score FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY performance_score DESC, interaction_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_interactions, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM user_interactions WHERE response_1 LIKE '%positive%' OR response_2 LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, performance_score DESC
SELECT interaction_type, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_data FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM performance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN performance ON interactions.user_id = performance.user_id WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT user_id, MAX(performance_score) AS highest_score FROM performance GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT response_id, user_id, response_text FROM user_responses ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM training_content WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_responses WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT response_text FROM user_responses WHERE response_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT content_id, content_data FROM training_content WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY content_id ASC
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE response IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT response_text FROM user_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ar_content_name, ar_content_type FROM ar_content;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, response FROM interactions JOIN user_responses ON interactions.user_id = user_responses.user_id;
SELECT ar_content_name, ar_content_type FROM ar_content WHERE ar_content_type = 'video' ORDER BY ar_content_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_rating FROM ar_training GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY highest_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, response FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id=100 AND interaction_id=3;
SELECT content_name FROM ARTrainingContent WHERE content_id=5;
SELECT user_id, performance_score FROM UserPerformance WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT user_id, customization_settings FROM UserCustomization WHERE customization_id=2;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_id, response FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ARTrainingContent WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, customization_id, customization_settings FROM UserCustomization WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY customization_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM UserPerformance WHERE performance_score > 90;
